data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample SIMPSUFE-92

Exposition E, Slope 40 deg, Geology: Terrassenschotter und Lehm, av. Tree height 15 m, Tree cover 50%, Shrub cover 30%, Herb cover 30%, Moss cover 80%, Vegatation type: Mob. instab. Hang. Uferunterschneidung, Film number: 807A
